content:
When remote content is blocked, there is a button ("Preferences") in the message that opens a drop-down menu with options to show the remote content and to change your remote content settings. Do you see that button?

If you really cannot open your messages at all, then more information about what is happening is needed.
creator: mozilla98

content: Gebruikte u IMAP of POP voor uw e-mail? Als het POP was, dan stonden uw berichten alleen lokaal en vrees ik dat ze verloren zijn, maar als u IMAP gebruikte, staan ze ook nog gewoon op de mailserver. Probeert u oude gegevens terug te zetten of hebt u Thunderbird gewoon opnieuw geïnstalleerd en uw e-mailaccount via de standaardroute toegevoegd?
creator: markh2

content: Indien u meerder accounts hebt, kan het zijn dat voor beide accounts het wachtwoord wordt gevraagd. U kunt er voor kiezen om het wachtwoord te laten onthouden door in datzelfde venstertje een vinkje te zetten bij ‘Wachtwoord onthouden’.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content:
Hej Bruno,

TRANSLATION When I delete an email, an icon appears on the bottom line showing there's still an unread email. It only disappears when I click on a random tab. How can this be changed?

SUGGESTION It may indicate a new message and/or an unread message and have nothing to do with your deletion of a message. Check your settings in Thunderbird settings > General > Incoming mail > When new messages arrive > App icon options.

Det kan indikere en ny besked og/eller en ulæst besked og har intet at gøre med din sletning af en besked. Tjek dine indstillinger i Thunderbird-indstillinger > Generelt > Indgående post > Når nye beskeder ankommer > App-ikonindstillinger.
creator: mozilla98

content: Jo man der er ikke flere nye beskeder, derfor burden den ikke vide det nåe jeg har slettet dem.
creator: bn1

content:
TRANSLATION Well, there are no more new messages, so it shouldn't know that now I've deleted them.

RESPONSE I note now that you wrote: "It only disappears when I click on a random tab." Then I have no explanation or solution. Does the badge number go away on its own if you wait longer?

Jeg bemærker nu, at du skrev: "Det forsvinder kun, når jeg klikker på en tilfældig fane." Så har jeg ingen forklaring eller løsning. Forsvinder mærkatnummeret af sig selv, hvis du venter længere?
creator: mozilla98

content: Nej den forsvinder ikke når jeg venter kun når jeg trykker på en tilfældig fane eller anden konto. Takker for dine svar må se om der kommer andre svar.
creator: bn1

content: TRANSLATION No, it doesn't disappear when I wait, only when I click on a random tab or another account.Thanks for your answers, I'll have to see if other responses come in.
creator: mozilla98

content:
Hej Bruno,

TRANSLATION I have created a Text signature and it is fine. I have noticed that when replying to emails, the text signature is not included. How do I get that done.

SUGGESTION Account settings > Composition & addressing > Include signature for replies

Kontoindstillinger > Opsætning og adressering > Inkluder signatur for svar
creator: mozilla98

content: Beklager men FORSLAG Kontoindstillinger > Skrivning og adressering > Medtag signatur til svar ser ikke ud til at findes.
creator: bn1

content:
TRANSLATION Sorry but the SUGGESTION Account Settings > Writing and Addressing > Include signature in replies does not appear to exist.

RESPONSE How are you accessing account settings? Click on the three-lined button at top right of your screen and select "Account settings". My translations may not be accurate. But such an option is there. If it really is not, please post a screenshot.

Hvordan får du adgang til kontoindstillinger? Klik på knappen med de tre streger øverst til højre på skærmen og vælg "Kontoindstillinger". Mine oversættelser er muligvis ikke præcise. Men sådan en mulighed er der. Hvis den virkelig ikke er der, så send et skærmbillede.
creator: mozilla98

content: Det har jeg prøvet det samme i venstre side med tandhjulet. ingen afstederne vises det.
creator: bn1

content:
TRANSLATION I tried the same thing on the left side with the gear. None of the settings show it.

RESPONSE The gear is for application settings. Click on account settings. Did you not follow my directions to use the three-lined button and click on "Account settings"? You can also right click on the account name in the folder pane and select "Settings".

Denne indstilling er til anvendelsesindstillinger. Klik på kontoindstillinger. Fulgte du ikke mine anvisninger om at bruge knappen med de tre streger og klikke på "Kontoindstillinger"? Du kan også højreklikke på kontonavnet i mappepanelet og vælge "Indstillinger".
creator: mozilla98

content: Jo også den du henviste til men det vises ikke. Tandhjulet og vælg konto indstillinger ser ud til at være ens med det du henviser til.
creator: bn1

content:
TRANSLATION I also see the one you referred to, but it doesn't show up. The gear icon and select account settings seem to be the same as what you're referring to.

RESPONSE No, they are not the same. After you click on the gear for Thunderbird settings, the option in that same location changes to account settings. There are several ways to access account settings. See the attached images. "Account settings" = kontoindstillinger.

Nej, de er ikke de samme. Efter du har klikket på tandhjulet for Thunderbird-indstillinger, ændres muligheden på samme sted til kontoindstillinger. Der er flere måder at få adgang til kontoindstillinger på. Se de vedhæftede billeder. "Account settings" = kontoindstillinger.
creator: mozilla98

content:
Try this:

  1. click file>offline>download to ensure all messages are downloaded
  2. click help>troubleshootinginformation
  3. rightclick and scroll to 'profile folder' and click 'open folder'
  4. exit thunderbird
  5. click the the imapmail\<IMAP account folder>
  6. COPY all desired folders to be uploaded and store in mail\Local Folders folder
  7. restart thunderbird and check that all folders are functional
  8. highlight one folder to be uploaded, rightclick, and select COPY to the desired Outlook account. (If the folder is huge, it may be prudent to copy small groups at a time, or to create a manual filter for this. IMAP was not designed for high volume uploads.)
  9. after the copy, check that the online folder is complete.
  10. repeat the two previous steps for each desired folder.
  11. after all have been uploaded, you may delete the Local Folders.
creator: davidsk

content:
Thanks much for your help. Sorry, I'm not following completely: 1. I don't see the 'File' option anywhere 2. I don't see 'Help' anywhere 5. where will I find this imapmail\<IMAP account folder> ?

Thank you
